name: LoadingScreenTweaks
description: Hides various elements of your choice from Geometry Dash's loading screen.

hideCocosAndFmod.name: Hide Cocos/FMod Watermarks
hideCocosAndFmod.description: Hides the Cocos Engine and FMod watermarks.

hideSplashText.name: Hide Splash Text
hideSplashText.description: Hides the loading screen splash text.

customSplashText.name: Custom Splash Text
customSplashText.description:
Toggles between custom loading screen splash text and RobTop's splash text.

(Enabling "Hide Splash Text" overrides this.)

custom.name: custom.txt Splash Text
custom.description:
<cp>[REQUIRES RESTART TO APPLY]</c>

Includes your own custom loading screen splash text.
Please edit the "custom.txt" file by opening this mod's config directory (look for the golden pencil button at the bottom left of the mod's introductory screen).

stanleyCeleste.name: Include the Stanley Parable + Celeste
stanleyCeleste.description:
<cp>[REQUIRES RESTART TO APPLY]</c>

Includes quotes from Celeste and The Stanley Parable.

customFont.name: Splash Text Font #
customFont.description:
Sets the font of all loading screen splash text messages. Default is 0 (falls back to <cl>goldFont</c>, as seen in vanilla Geometry Dash).

Notes:
- <cj>-1 for Pusab, -2 for chatFont.</c>
- <cy>To use font numbers greater than 0: refer to the level editor for the font each number corresponds to, subtract that number by 1, and then put it here.</c>

customFontGoldColor.name: Gold Color (Non-Golden Pusab Fonts)
customFontGoldColor.description: Applies something close to the gold color loading screen splash text messages <cp>only if your setting for "'New Best' Text Font #" is not 0</c>.

multiline.name: Multiline Splash Text
multiline.description: Custom splash texts can either become multiline splash texts (if this is enabled) or be limited to one line (if this is disabled). Here is where you make that decision.

issues.info: To disable hyphen prefixes and suffixes in custom messages, edit saved.json. For other issues, ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
